name: Little Girly Inconveniences
description:
Little Girly Inconveniences is a life simulator that displays the different ways in which intersectionality affects women throughout their lives. 

The plot variations occur according to:

  1. Player choices (i.e., choosing your ethnicity, attaining post-secondary, etc.) 
  2. Dice-rolled outcomes, with probabilities that differ according to the player's choices to emulate real life happenstances

The life simulator ages you up in 5 year intervals, and it allows you to select a life path to embark on (career vs. family) to emphasize gender aggressions in the workplace and in social/familial settings.
